response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a price of $130 for it. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the high value I see in this product for someone like you. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 130}
